title: Inclua - Recursos Educacionais
subtitle: Institutional webpage
description: Webpage for a Brazilian company committed to developing innovative products and solutions in the Universal Design methodology to promote inclusive learning for people with and without disabilities

title: SpaceX Clone
subtitle: Clone of the SpaceX website
description:
Clone of the 2020 version of the SpaceX website, multi-pages, responsive, and just for fun and practice. 
 Made this project using just HTML, CSS, and plain JavaScript

title: Etable
subtitle: Interactive 3D Experience
description:
A work in progress of a company's innovative project. Everything was modeled in three.js.
 I'm currently working on lightning, interactivity, and animations of the product

title: Marble Race
subtitle: 3D Minigame
description: Simple race game to practice react with state management, and three.js and react-three-fiber with physics and animations and performance.

title: Space Trip
subtitle: Fictional Space Trip Agency
description: Practicing react, tailwindcss and next routing in this project. This is a website for a  fictional trip agency for spatial exploration. The design was based on a challenge of Frontend Mentor

title: This Site
subtitle: Personal portfolio
description: This is the first personal portfolio that I made to show my work and try to get hired as a front-end developer. I hope you have liked it so far, I keep updating it constantly and fixing occasional bugs that appear.
